english: The vehicle ' s suspected of being involved in a carjacking last week in valencia
chinese: 它涉嫌与上星期在瓦伦西亚的一次劫车有关

english: The vehicle ' s suspected of being involved in a carjacking last week in valencia . .
chinese: 它涉嫌与上星期在瓦伦西亚的一次劫车有关

english: Trusted servants turn on them ; carjackers and thieves line up outside their gate
chinese: 信赖的仆人告发了他们，劫车贼和小偷成群结队地后在门外。

english: A carjacking at the corner of cherry lane and the interstate 30 access road has left local residents shocked
chinese: 樱桃路上和30号州际干道交口发生的劫车案件令当地居民惶惶不安。

english: That afternoon , a policeman stopped me on the road and asked me to go to the station to identify four people that had been detained . they had confessed that they were intending to steal a taxi and murder the driver , but they didn t know why they had changed their minds
chinese: 下午公安局的人则在路上挡住我的车去局里对证，说那四人被抓到了，四人供证：本意是想杀人劫车，不知为什么临时改变了念头。
劫车造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
